description: Olivia`s Lycanroc is her main Pokémon and it seems to stay out of its Poké Ball quite often. It quickly became friends with Ash`s Rockruff and the two of them were seen curled up together on the deck of the boat sleeping. Olivia`s Lycanroc was able to help save a trapped Wailer by smashing the surrounding rocks that it had got stuck in.
name: Lugarugan (Lychee)
